title: Kids can get rad with new Kali Maya Artist Series Child Convertible Full Face Helmet
content:
Not sure whether to get your child a half-shell or full face helmet? Why not both? Like many of the adult helmets out there now, Kali is offering a convertible full face helmet for children. And it’s part of the Kali Artist Series, which supports artists and results in a rad design. The Maya Full Face Child

The post Kids can get rad with new Kali Maya Artist Series Child Convertible Full Face Helmet appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
